text: ewani noyekuth susanyoga thibenawa.
aththatama mama hithagena hitiye aththatama api illana thagi denne naththal siya kiyala.
eeka wenama aathal ekak) wenna hithagena inana kattiya kochcharawath wamarana 'subhawitha' kiyana ekata witharayi.
haritha balashakthiya wani dirghakalina wasi sahitha balashakthi janana krama pilibanda ohuge awadhanaya yomu wima pasasiya yuthu katayuththaki.
aneka boho dena dannawa me yanne awasana joliful kalaya bawa.
garu arnast poruthota piyanama
hari hari, innako.......
prakata samagam dekak netbuk nishpadanaya athhara dame….
laptop pariganakayaka eyata samana kotasma atha, namuth eewa thani satahan pothak tharame pakejayakata sanyukthakara atha
e wagema eya ape pati ta hari mata hari katha kaleth eyata badagini unoth hari ude pandarama kuduwa ira eliya watena thiyaganna oona unoth hari witharayi..
uge pingane 'je' akura uu ethakotath andala iwara karala thibune na.
akula gannawanam akula gatha yuthu wi aththe durmatha padanam kara gatha yojanaya.
pasukalinawa, daruwanta heada hakiyawak awashya wena bima, nana kamaraya saha wasikiliya pirisidu kala hakiya.
pasugiya rajaya pohora sahanadharaya dima wiwidha parshawa wiwidhakarayen wigraha karayi.
onna ohoma thamayi paw sidda karaganne nathuwa api kukul mas kawe...kohomada birindage mole.
"oba pem karana obe kumari obata aadare kiyana ayurin pera dinayaka ma pem karana sanda' maru salli ganda.....
"na eeka gana amathaka karanna kiyanna.
supiri palath simitha panduwara tharagawaliyata sanchithaya nam kere
eeth sakachcha kala kiyanawa pattapal boru damanawa.'
dina kihipayakata awashya aaharapana, suddhapawitha්ra kirimata awashya upakarana da raugena giyaha.
ee assema agamathithuma gampola andanawa dakka janadhipathi thumage aswalada kandulu piruneya.
winisuruwaraya – widuli sandesha niyamana komishan sabhawe samaja subasadhana aramudale asthamenthu mudala kopamanada?
mulawe kalawa soyana kalakaruwan da ?
ithin api oonama kenekta bisnas ekak karala goda yanna puluwan thamanta galapenama eka hoyagaththoth.
"harige bhasha wilashaya harima lassanayi."
ema aramuna kara ya hakke gnyanawanthayanta bawa da bududahama pawasa atha.
me wasare nawaka naluwan gananawakma dorata wadina athara sinama kshethraye wadi denakuge manapaya dina gena sitinne karan kapadiyaya.
eheth mul kathawa apa asuwa lesinma idiripath kalemu.
“wandurata dalipihiya ahuwuna wage” yanuwen kiyamanak api asa aththemu.

issarashir gar tansayit yatithala pahasukam nisa gamanagamanaya sandaha atamagam gettuwa wasa atha marana ramuwa marana riyak prasampadana danwima: marsin athara athurudahan wu prasampadanaya sampurna kirima - adana-sehan ildrim wisin tarbali, ismir hi karforsa risashas lojistiks sentar wiwrutha karana ladi.
mage aadare bindunoth bindunamayi.

wadamulu sammantha්rana aawaranaya karannata yana owun wenuwen waya wana mudala piyawenne me rate podu mahajanathawage mudalini.lingika allas ganim pilibandawa hitapu amathiwarunta pawa erehiwa chodana thibini.
apa balaporoththu wu paridi dayanage ho kamila pakarge pinthura wenuwata ohu aden nagitte maharajinage rupaya dakimini.
kriyadama sancharakayinge sonduru thothannak wana nakals wana petha yanu hektayar wisidahasakin pamana hebi sobadam nirmana rashiyakin yuth isawwaki.
api patan gaththe thun awurudu salasmakata polonnaruwa sanwardhanaya kirimatayi. 2018 warshaya awasan wana wita gamwala siyaluma yatithala pahasukam sanwardhanaya awasan wenawa.
dewanna nam siya idiriye hidimin, kuda poth pinchak matha, panak aadharayen sajiwiwa liyanu labana lipiyakwimayi.
tikak wela kibod eka diha balan hitiyama hiserade.
kasthuriaarachchi mahatha:- ma uparima kriyamarga gaththa.
ee anuwa api lipiyakin owunta ape akamaththa danwala yawanawa.
thawama kal wadiyi..
sanwardhitha ratawala wisheshagnyawaru bihi wanne lankawa wani thunwana lokaye ratawala men wibhagayak kirimen pamanak nowe.
anthime di kewin pitarsanta thibune athapaya hiri arena thuru thana thille pahalata awida emin piththa wanima witharayi.

sanjaka prasad ෙdalewaththa ranil serama badagena: ethuma mata tikak bayayi maithripala sirisena janadhipathiwaraya yatathe ranil wikramasinha mahathage agramathya dhurayen yuth kolambaa than thanwalin mini kali mathuwena abirahasa kolambaa jana samajaya kohomatath wiwidhaya.
jettamula masaya yanu poson masayayi.
in palamu wanna nam thaman parisaraye jiwath wiya yuthu bawayi.
eheth ema siyalu balawega abhiyasa ohuge mathaya wuye janathawa udesa sewaya kirima nisa, siduwana maranaya wadath shreshta maranayak wana bawayi.
e් gaththa thiranaya gana ...
meyata wagakiwa yuththe kolambaa guwan gaman palaka madiriyada?
kadin kada hari awith oluwa dana ekama loku deyakne..
mala gewal, mangul gewal aadiye sarasiliwalin thamayi wada patan gaththe.
aami eken aapu mata hondatama mathaka kena thamayi el.ech.sarath nohoth aami sarath.
dewalayata nagenahirin mitar 1.00ka pamana durin anantha wasudew bogamandapaya pihiti athara, dakunu dishawen pradeshaye welandasal kihipayak da pihita atha.
diwa rathri duk windinno ya.

me sandaha udahana washayen kaya saha manasa pilibanda bedima, anuragaya nathahoth lingikathwaya saha premaya pilibanda bedima, hadawatha saha adhyathmaya athara bedima, andura saha aalokaya pilibanda bedima (mehi aalokaya aththe sanskruthiya, shishtacharaya pasayi) yanadiya gatha hakiya.
bingutalu madu mi purawa denne

sikurada dinayaka rathriye payak wani kalayak thula wikramasinha mahathage rajya palana balaya, ohuta nodanwa sampurnayen kanapita harawa eya rajapaksha mahathata labadime, sirisena janadhipathiwarayage kriyawa gana rata thula sitina laksha gananak wawana ejapa, yahapalana pakshikayan, hithawathun saha buddhimath podu janathawa dakwu prathichara pilibandawaya.
nalikawa wikinimata ho badudimata adhyakshakawarun uthsaha kirima hethukota genaya.

maraniya dandanayata lakwa walikada bandhanagaraya thula siragathawa sitina atharathuradi shri jayawardhanapura wishwawidyalayen shasthrawedi upadhiya labagath hitapu upa polis parikshaka indika bamunusinha pashchath upadhiya hadarima sandaha kalaniya wishwawidyalaye liyapadinchi wu bawa bandhanagara departhamenthuwa pawasayi.
guwan hamudapathi thumani, me obe awadhanaya pinisayi
hariyata 130 homagama, maharagama, kotuwa, kadawatha wage.
halaya: man kiwwe, wellawahum hadanneyi kiyala.
eeta athirekawa yamak siduwana wita ee siduwima gana wicharashiliwa nirikshanaya karamin wartha karanne janamadhya wisin.
mewaye samabarathawa matha thamayi molayata rudhira sapayuma laba denne.snayu wisheshagnya shalya waidya dipal aththanayaka mahathasamanyayen hise hama iwath kala pasu dakinne asthi.
me ammath puthatath wada mata aadareyi.
me widiyata this awuruddakatath wada kal damagath wadapiliwela bohoma kelin idiriyata dama gath awasthawa hatiyata me ayawaya handunwala denna puluwan.

ugath padam saha prathisandhanaya pilibanda wu komisame nirdesha padanam kota gath jathika kriyakari salasma kadinamin kriyawata nanwana lesa ema salasme sabhapathi, janadhipathi lekam lalith wirathunga mahatha amathyansha lekamwarun athulu departhamenthu pradhaninta upades dunneya.
ebawin apa aayojana labagathayuththe mudal thibena chinayenda nathahoth chinayata naya gathi indiyawenda yanna thora ganima sha්ri lankawe palakayinge wagakimaki.
badulla disthrikkaye thorathuru
‘sudu none.apita winod mahaththayage salli labuna kiyala dana gaththoth honda na.ee hinda api nayak gaththa wage wada karanda oona.’
ekak thamayi uparimama..
eka athekin purawasi sanwidhana ee sandaha pulul wadasatahanak kriyathmaka karayi.
sinhala bauddhayo poduwe gathkala batahirayan anukaranaya no kalaha
\\\mokada oba kiyana de kenekta maranthika wenna puluwan deyak.
namuth ee harahada minis hadawath suwapath kara manawa dayawen, samayen purawalana nisa samaja yahapatha wenuwen wakrakarayen sidu karanu labana meheya itha wadagathya.
eeth paduyi apita.
namuth awasna aagnyabhumiya wu nakran kri.wa. 313di goguryowa wisin winasha karana thekma wadagath aarthika saha sanskruthika kendrasthanayak lesa pawathini.

(kurunagala athireka bandara rathnayaka) wayambaa palath sabhawa basil apata wada karanna denne na sabaragamuwa samuhashri lanka podujana peramuna athule wada karanna basil rajapaksha ida nodena bawa shri lanka podujana peramuna sanwidhayaka lekam hitapu parlimenthu manthri anuruddha polgampala mahatha eeye (10) madhya sakachchawak...
polanthaye shchechinhi agosthu 2013 hi.
pora gana man echchara deyak dan na.
me bawa anguththara nikaye drona suthrayehi sandahan we.

kanimen hamuwu gal aayudha ha sathwa atakatu adhyayanaya shri lankawe di sidu kere.2012 wasare sidu karana lada kanimedi hamuwu manawa atasakilla nirikshanaya kala mahacharya shiran daraniyagala saha aacharya nimal perera mahathwaru atasakille his kabale dath gewiyama asthiwala ghanathwaya, wadime swabhawaya anuwa eya wayasa awurudu wissaka tharuniyakage bawa thahawuru kara thibini.ape aadi miththaniya ge sirura me wanawita kembrij wishwa widyalaye rasayanagarayak thula sanrakshanaya karamin thibe.ema sanrakshana katayuthu awasan nathi bawa pawasana purawidya adhyaksha janaralwaraya sanrakshana katayuthu nima wimen pasu eya nawatha lankawata gena eemata katayuthu karana bawa prakasha kara siti.danata hamuwi athi aadima janawasaye minisun wasaya kala kala parasaya awurudu 48000 - 5000 dakwa we.
akki oyage lipiya nam harima rasawath.
ee kiyapu pramaneta eya hitiya nan ehema me wenakota rassawak hoya ganna wela...
medeyin oppu wune wimal wirawansha manthri×raya swadhina nathi bawayi.
ahala athine ara podi ekek anda chithraya.
ee athara boks ofis wartha pihita wu chithrapata bohomayak wiya.
kohomeyi wela thiyenne, gura eeye ra mokakda santhikarmayak karanawa kiyala dewa kutiyata giyalu, ude undage pawula thama dakala thiyenne ,unda ethana marila innawa.

lokaye oonama mal wargayak waga kirimata tharam saru pasak lankawe pawathiyadi pemwathunge dinaya, mawwarunge dinaya wani awasthawanta awashya rosa wani wisithuru mal warga wadi washayen aanayanaya karanu labayi.

nawika hamuda bottuwalin gos dhiwara bottuwala happa, dal kapagena awith reguwata bhara denawa.
namal sancharaka wyaparaya diyunu kala hati.
jangama durakathanayen polis niladharinta pawa abhiyoga karamin pawul pitin mara damana bawata tharjanaya kala madhush hathara wani thattuwedi pathwa sitiye balu kukkekuge ganataya.

ethanin nonawathi ohuge mrutha dehaya kunu loriyaka damimata tharam mlechcha hithak papuwak nathi mrugayanta diya yuthu danduwama thiranaya kala yuththe adala rate nithiya kriyathmaka karana baladharinya.

boho wita gruhastha hinsanayata thududena samiyage bimathkama, duracharaya, mathdrawyawalata abbahiwim aadiya nisa hembathwa sitina biriya me siyalu dukgahata iwasanne daruwan wenuwen menma ‘dikkasadaya’ samiya polisigenayama, usawiyama ‘daruwanta honda nathi’ nisaya.gruhastha hinsana kriyawalata lakwu kanthawan wenuwen nithimaya pihitata anapanath handunwa dunnada eewayehi prayojana ganimata shri lankeya kanthawa maliwanne kutumbhayaka athi wadagathkama gana owun thewarak sithana bawinya.kanthawa gruhastha hinsanayata lakwima pilibanda siddhin soya balimedi peniyana thawath karunak wanne owunge pawulpasubimayi.

jayagrahi lilawakin geta godawana puthraya desa balu piya ge muwagata sina rallak nagune koluwa hapana, baya wenna kari na.matath wada suraya yayi sithamini.parsalaya digahara balbaya sawi kirimata piyada puthrayada sudanam wuha.eheth ehi thibune iwathalana widuli pandamaki.piyatada puthrayatada hin dadiya damuweya.paduwa widaganu wina dedenatama kalahaki wenath deyak nowiya.
ohuge maranaya kakulwalata, bellata ha papuwata sidukara thibena paharadim nisa athiwu thuwala nisa ha ginna nisa siduwi thibena bawaya.
daniha diha athagalada?

meyata amatharawa wishwa widyala adhyapanaya sandaha tharunayan yomu nowimata balapa hethun athara wishwawidyala adhyapana kalaya yanu watina kalayak winashakara damimak ya yana mathaya samajaya thula godanagi thibima da hethuwak wi atha.
wasara kipayaka sita me gamiyan muhuna dena barapathala asadharanayak gana kiyannata ya.
mama eyata sindaralla kathawa kiyala iwarath naha.
eheth sawasa patan gathahoth adutharame mul nawathanatawath ya haki nowadayi sitha ma gamana aarambha karannata patan gaththemi.
me aakarayatama wishwaye athi kudama wasthuwa wana paramanuwak gana salaka balana kala ehi nashtiya wata kuda anshuwak wana ilektrona gaman karayi.
mata umbaawa mathak una male!
oba da ese ma deneth idiriye dalwi esanin athurudan wu asaniyak lesa mama salakannemi.

niwi niwi balb paththuwana upakarana wani sulu parimanaye widuli upakarana walata athi kamaththa nisa un wahansewa dana siti dayaka hithawathun athara siti wideshagathawa sita paminena aya ha widesgatha gnyathin sitina aya nitharama unwahanseta ewani de genawith dena ladi.
anith bawsaraya langadi miladi gaththe.
mata delkanda goldan aros ekedi hambawenawa punsiri soyisa ekka.
adhikaranaya magin panawa athi waranayan nosalaka harimin thama kiri piti nishpadanawala wisha rasayanayan ha baktiriya nomathi bawata pracharayan gena yamata erehiwa fontera samagamata erehiwa....
chamara wirasinha mewani satahanak palakaranne dadi sith wedanawakin bawa kiwa yuthuyi.
amarathunga mahatha thama pambaagalen goda eema sandaha itha darunu lesa bududahama wikruthi karayi.
ohugeth mageth bila gewa damu wigasin mata me minisagen galawiya haki yayi ma sithu sithiwilla hudu hithaluwak pamanakma wuye. . . . .

maruna si kyong eyage issaraha innawa..awurudu ganakin wahapu mukyong steshan eka ,ee loke thamath wada passe du won me hama dema wenne wena lokeka kiyala hoyagena ee loke widiyata jiwath wenna uthsaha karanawa …

pauranikathwaya ha nuthanathwaya ohuge wignyanaya thula stharagatha wi athi bawath bahira nuthanathwaya wisin yatapath kara thabana lada wignyanayak lesa atham purwa nuthana lakshana ohu thula adangu wana bawath pene.
katha karanna nam labenne hari simithawa mama wena rataka inna nisa....
"echcharamada kiyanna oone" uu magen ahuwe kindiyata...
guru wruththiya ho banku aayathanawala pradhana thanathurak labayi.
owun apa men sithiwili sira karagena, 'winaya' namathi sirageyi sirawuna wahalun nemeyi...
chandeth hondata kalane.)
aya nawathath gi gayannata ekwune ‘da champiyan’ nam wu age aluth ma githayath samangayi. ෙm githaya patigatha wune kari hadisi anathurata lak wennata kalin.
pirith huya adimatath me raja gaha yoda ganna bawa apa wataha gatha yuthu wenawa.
ee witharak neweyi.
korona wairas ennath sandaha lowa sama ratakatama samana praweshayak thibiya yuthu bawata eksath jathinge aarakshaka mandalaya eeye yojanawak sammatha karaganu labuwa.

sande lidar karthru lasantha wikramathunga ghathanaya sambandhayen rimandbharaye siti hamuda buddhi ansha samajika premananda udalagama apa matha mudaharimata galkissa mahesthrath mohomad shabdin ada (27) niyoga kaleya.

ehidi karunanayaka mahatha eya srujuwama prathikshepa kara athi athara ohu agamathiwarayata pawasa aththe thaman mema siduwime sruju parshwakaruweku bawin mathiwarana komisama hamuwata gos ewani illimak sidukala nohaki bawayi.
obata apage da yomu wiya hakiya nawgatha kirime ha bedaharim pituwa.
danne muna hariyata dakke..
habarakada piriwenata adasiyawasayi

mulliwayikkal samaruma wenuwen uthuru palath sabhawa niyojanaya karana manthriwarungen rupiyal 7000 bagin ekathu kara thibu athara, adala mudal ekathu kirimedi palath sabha wipakshanayakawaraya mudal labadi thibu athara mulliwayikkal samarime sanwidhana katayuthu yapanaya wishwawidyala sisun wisin sidu kirima hethuwen ema samarume mudal kelesa wiyadam kaleda yanna sambandhayen palath sabha wipakshanayaka aar.thawarasa mahatha wisin pasugiya palath sabha sasiwaraye di palath sabha pradhana amathyawarayagen wimasa thibini.
ethakota duk wena oone na.
wiwadayakadi kata sara muhuna ralu ayata dinanna puluwan wena kramaya wenuwata idiripath wana karunu anuwa thiranayak ganna puluwan kramayak hadenna oona.
di obata hakiyawa athi parishilakayan ha samaga sanniwedanaya kirimata wenath ratawal walin.
ohu wasara thunak thisse ethuma ge pa්radhana aarakshaka niladhariya lesa sewaya karayi.
ma karana raki­yawa mangin mata me de kiri­mata...
ranilta gahanne kawda.
tharuna tharuniyan wishala gananakata boksin uganwa athi me guruwaraya lokaye pahala wu shreshta boksin shurayeku wu mohomad ali amerikawe chikago nuwaradi thamanta muna gasunu bawa prakasha karayi.
eeka mahindage gama nisane?
me ha sambandha thawath chandrika yugalak da mema wasara thuladima abhyawakashagathakirimata niyamithaya.eesa asurini.
rokat ekak wunath wayugolaya tharanaya kalata passe pahala kotasa athharinawa.
eya mahansi wela godanagapu dene...
owun danna shasthraya beduweth mudal balaporoththuwa nemeyi.

me siddhiyen peni yanne kiyana tharam shuddhawanthayaku wimata wimal wirawansha mahathata bari bawa ya.
na..na.” “umbaata kawuru hari mona­wath kawwa da?”

thama supurudu sewaka madulla nisa udasina bawata pathwa sitina wiyapath wiktoriya rajina mema tharuna indiyanu sewakaya kerehi unanduwak dakwana athara pasuwa meya dedena athara samipa mithrathwayakata hareyi.
godak thiyenne ohoma unagaman jiwithema awul kara ganna pawul.
sinhalen eeka mehema liyanna puluwan: “kisiyam parapurak,swakiya parapurata adala karyabharaya soyaganimath, eya sapala kirima ho pawadimath kala yuththe sapeksha aparadrashya thaththwayak thulayi”.
tho wage buruwekuta mama monawa kiwwath kalath therenne na.
kataka lagna himiyange dahawanna wu rakiya sthanayata guru paminima asubayi.
praharaya siduwana wita bandhanagara niladharihu hath ata denek eya bala sitiyaha.
meka ithama nidahas samaja madhyayak.
"mejar newilta banku ginum 17yi, birindata 16yi" mayen puwathak api...
eseth nomathi nam ema niwes himiya mema awi aayudha pathala kalli sandaha alewi kirime jawaramaka niratha wuyeda yanna sambandhayen polisiya pathi kipayak osse parikshana sidu karayi.
mosthara nirmana shilpiniyak wana ket sped mema durakathanayata sarilana pramanaye kawarayak nirmanaya kirimata da katayuthu kara thibe.
nawa nipayum walata hodayi.
game pansale hamuduruwo mokada kiyanne?
ekata ek kara liyana
dan tikak wiweka ganna.
aksharayak lesa penna dimata puluwan.
adhibharaya panawime waradata hasuwanne rajaye sampath ayuthu lesa bhawitha kala thanaththatayi.
ee shakthiya mata hamadama thiyenawa.
adahas prakasha kirime nidahasa mardanaya kirimen wenne niwatayange saha biyasullalange samajayak bihiwima pamanayi.
wayambaa, madhyama janathawa dun thinduwa janadhipathithumata eksath jathinge sanwidhanaya idiriye editharawa katha karanna laba dun thinduwak.
hamadama awul ne..
kin parajayata path karamin.
ee wena kenek.
un unge mahansiyen hari hamba karala goda giya minissu.
nilar giya gana dakwuye ewan adahasak.
ee wana wita kolambaa araliya gaha mandiraya brithanyayen path kota siti merata pradhana lekamwara shrimath greham tiral ge wasabhawana wiya.

(kolambaa, lankapuwath) – anuradhapura adhikarana sankirnaya idiripita margayedi kanthawaka wedi thaba ghathanaya kara thawath ayekuta thuwala sidu kirime siddhiyata waradakaru wu anuradhapura polisiye hitapu polis parikshakawarayaku saha ema siddhiyata sambandha thawath pudgalayekuta uthuru mada palath bada mahadhikarana winisuru manjula thilakarathna mahatha eeye (10) marana danduwama niyama kara thibe.
ma me ihatha kamentuwen adahas kale oba oya 100 ankayata wada loku deyak kara athi bawayi.
rathana hamuduruwan ape ithihasayata garu karanne naha.

awashya drawya : pirisidu karagath iramusu gram 400 kakulu hal gram 100 sudulunu bik kihipayak lunu awashya pamana wathura koppa 3 polkiri koppa 2sada ganna kramaya : samanya bathak pisina aakarayata wada tharamak wadipura wathura dama bath beri wenathuru thamba ganna.

adala wartha adhyayanaya kara gathayuthu idiri kriyamarga sambandhayen warthawak labana masa 15 wanada wanawita thamanta bharadena lesayi janadhipathiwaraya adala kamituwata upades labadi aththe.shreshtadhikarana winisuru janak da silwa, abhiyachanadhikarana winisuru nishshanka bandula karunarathna, wishramika abhiyachanadhikarana winisuru sunil rajapaksha, wishramika mahadhikarana winisuru bandula kumara athapaththu athulu samajikayin pas denekugen sadumlath pasku irida thrastha praharaya sambandhayen soyabalimata path kala janadhipathi parikshana komisame awasan warthawa janadhipathiwaraya wetha bharadenu labuwe pasugiya 1 wanadayi.anathuruwa ehi pitapathak thaman wetha bharadena lesa kadinal himipanan wisin illimak kala athara, adala komisan sabha warthawa adhyayanaya kirima sandaha amathya kamituwak janadhipathiwaraya wisin path kale in anathuruwayi.kese wethath ada katuwapitiya dewasthanaya idiripita pawathi samakami wirodhathawata kolambaa agaradaguru athi uthum malkam kadinal ranjith himipananda ekwuna.
